content.text: I'm doing well! What about you?
I'm doing great! What do you do for a living?
I'm a race car driver. What about you?
I'm a fashion designer, but I'm hiding my passion from my conservative family.
That's so cool! Do you like your job?
I love it! I love designing clothes and seeing people wear them.
That's awesome! I love pasta too. What's your favorite kind?
I love carbonara! What about you?
I love Alfredo! I like to check my nails every day to see if they're still looking good. Do you do anything like that?
I do! I always check my hair and makeup to make sure I look good.
That's good! We both like to look our best.
We do! I'm glad we have that in common.
Me too! Have a great day!
